an.translation[0].definitions[0].definit: used when the following word begins with a vowel sound
an.translation[1].definitions[0].definit: the form used for a before a vowel sound
an.translation[1].definitions[1].example: anoxia  (=a condition caused by lack of oxygen)
an.translation[2].definitions[0].definit: someone or something of, from, or connected with a particular thing, place, or person
an.translation[2].definitions[1].definit: someone skilled in or studying a particular subject
